actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1034 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional 1-year period for first using a new residence which was purchased during the period provided in such section 1034.

summary.text: Changes the requirement that a taxpayer (having purchased a new residence within a year of the sale of his old residence) must use the new residence within 1 year for purposes of nonrecognition of gain under the Internal Revenue Code to allow him up to 2 years to use such new residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1034 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional 1-year period for first using a new residence which was purchased during the period provided in such section 1034.
